com.netflix.genie.server.metrics

Class GenieNodeStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.server.metrics.GenieNodeStatistics

  • public final class GenieNodeStatistics
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class that implements all servo monitoring for Genie.
